mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_common_code maintb where common_cd = #{common_cd}
SELECT * FROM tb_place maintb where place_key = #{place_key}
select * from tb_shipping where shipping_key = concat(#{shipping_key},'-00')
select max(supply_dt) as supply_dt from tb_shipping where orderfor_key = #{orderfor_key} and shipping_seq > 0
SELECT DISTINCT MAX(idx.rows) FROM SYSINDEXES as idx INNER JOIN SYSOBJECTS AS obj ON (idx.id = obj.id) WHERE (obj.type = 'U') AND (obj.name = 'tb_orderfor')
SELECT * FROM tb_orderfor maintb where orderfor_key = #{orderfor_key}

SELECT maintb.company_cd /* 업체코드 */ , maintb.order_dt /* 발주일자 */ , maintb.material_num /* 품번 */ , maintb.knumh /* CondReqNo */ , maintb.user_id /* 사용자아이디 */ , maintb.supply_place /* 납품처 */ , maintb.supply_req_qty /* 납품요청수량 */ , maintb.supply_req_dt /* 납품요청일 */ , maintb.confirm_qty /* 확정수량 */ , maintb.shipping_dt /* 출하일자 */ , maintb.unit_price /* 단가 */ , maintb.total_price /* 금액 */ , maintb.last_receive_dt /* 최종수령일 */ , maintb.use_fl /* 취소여부 */ , maintb.modify_id /* 수정자아이디 */ , CONVERT(CHAR(19), maintb.modify_dt, 20) as modify_dt /* 수정일자 */ FROM tb_orderfor
and company_cd = #{company_cd} and order_dt = #{order_dt} and material_num = #{material_num} and place_key = #{place_key}
mapper.insert:
SELECT case when MAX(RIGHT(orderfor_key,2)) IS NULL then concat(#{company_cd},'-',RIGHT(REPLACE(#{order_dt},'.',''),6),'-01') else concat(#{company_cd},'-',RIGHT(REPLACE(#{order_dt},'.',''),6),'-', RIGHT(CONCAT('000',MAX(RIGHT([orderfor_key],2)+1)),2)) end new_cd FROM tb_orderfor where company_cd = #{company_cd} and order_dt = #{order_dt}
insert into tb_orderfor ( orderfor_key, company_cd, order_dt, material_num, place_key, knumh, user_id, process_cd, supply_place, supply_req_qty, supply_req_dt, unit_price, total_price, modify_id, modify_dt ) values ( #{new_cd}, #{company_cd}, #{order_dt}, #{material_num}, #{place_key}, #{knumh}, #{user_id}, #{process_cd}, #{supply_place}, replace(#{supply_req_qty},',',''), #{supply_req_dt}, replace(#{unit_price},',',''), replace(#{total_price},',',''), #{modify_id}, getdate() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_shipping WHERE shipping_key = concat(#{orderfor_key},'-00') and orderfor_key = #{orderfor_key}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_shipping ( shipping_key, orderfor_key, shipping_seq, process_cd, use_fl, modify_id, modify_dt ) values ( concat(#{orderfor_key},'-00'), #{orderfor_key}, #{shipping_seq}, 'ST_BOS', 'ING', #{modify_id}, getdate() )
mapper.update: merge into TB_ORDERFOR tar using( SELECT maintb.[ORDERFOR_KEY] ,sum(maintb.[SUPPLY_QTY]) sumqty FROM [dbo].[TB_SHIPPING] maintb inner join [dbo].[TB_ORDERFOR] oritb on maintb.ORDERFOR_KEY = oritb.ORDERFOR_KEY WHERE maintb.shipping_seq > 0 and len(maintb.[RECEIVE_DT]) = 10 and maintb.PROCESS_CD = 'ST_BCP' and oritb.PROCESS_CD != 'ST_BCP' group by maintb.[ORDERFOR_KEY] ) src on tar.ORDERFOR_KEY = src.ORDERFOR_KEY and tar.confirm_qty = src.sumqty WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tar.PROCESS_CD = 'ST_BCP' , tar.LAST_RECEIVE_DT = CONVERT(CHAR(10), getdate(), 102);
mapper.select: SELECT knumh /* CondRegNo */ , material_num /* 자재코드 */ , unit_price /* 단가 */ FROM OPENQUERY(ERP_DL, ' SELECT maintb.KNUMH as knumh , RIGHT(maintb.VAKEY,CHARINDEX('' '',REVERSE(maintb.VAKEY))-1) as material_num , ISNULL(ROUND(subtb.KBETR / subtb.KPEIN *100,0),0) as unit_price FROM wjp.KONH maintb LEFT OUTER JOIN wjp.KONP subtb ON maintb.KNUMH = subtb.KNUMH where maintb.VAKEY like concat(''460020'',''${company_cd}'',''%'') and DATBI = ''99991231'' and maintb.DATAB = (select max(DATAB) from wjp.KONH where VAKEY = maintb.VAKEY and DATBI = ''99991231'' and subtb.LOEVM_KO != ''X'') ') ORDER BY material_num ASC

SELECT knumh /* CondRegNo */ , material_num /* 자재코드 */ , unit_price /* 단가 */ FROM OPENQUERY(ERP_DL, ' SELECT maintb.KNUMH as knumh , RIGHT(maintb.VAKEY,CHARINDEX('' '',REVERSE(maintb.VAKEY))-1) as material_num , ISNULL(ROUND(subtb.KBETR / subtb.KPEIN *100,0),0) as unit_price FROM wjp.KONH maintb LEFT OUTER JOIN wjp.KONP subtb ON maintb.KNUMH = subtb.KNUMH where maintb.VAKEY like concat(''460020'',''${company_cd}'',''%'') and DATBI = ''99991231'' and maintb.DATAB = (select max(DATAB) from wjp.KONH where VAKEY = maintb.VAKEY and DATBI = ''99991231'' and subtb.LOEVM_KO != ''X'') ') where material_num = #{material_num} and knumh = #{knumh}

select oritb.material_num /* 품번 */ , maintb.supply_qty /* 납품수량 */ , oritb.unit_price , 'EA' as unit_type , maintb.supply_qty * oritb.unit_price as total_price , maintb.supply_qty * oritb.unit_price*0.1 as tax_price , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY oritb.material_num ASC) as rownum , saptb.company_nm , saptb.company_addr , case when len(saptb.stcd2 COLLATE Korean_Wansung_CI_AS) = 10 then concat(left(saptb.stcd2 COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS,3),'-',substring(saptb.stcd2 COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS,3,2),'-',right(saptb.stcd2 COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS,5)) else '' end regster_no , saptb.j_1kfrepre , saptb.j_uptae , saptb.j_jongmok , plc.place_nm from tb_orderfor oritb inner join OPENQUERY(ERP_DL, ' select distinct a.ID , b.NAME1 as company_nm , concat(b.ORT01, '' '',b.STRAS) as company_addr , b.STCD2 stcd2 , b.J_1KFREPRE j_1kfrepre , b.J_1KFTBUS j_uptae , b.J_1KFTIND j_jongmok from wjp.ZMMT2010 a inner join wjp.KNA1 b on a.ID = b.KUNNR ') saptb on saptb.ID COLLATE Korean_Wansung_CI_AS = oritb.user_id inner join tb_shipping maintb on oritb.orderfor_key = maintb.orderfor_key inner join tb_place plc on oritb.place_key = plc.place_key WHERE maintb.shipping_seq > 0 and oritb.company_cd = #{company_cd} and maintb.process_cd = #{process_cd} and maintb.supply_dt = #{supply_dt} and oritb.place_key = #{place_key} order by oritb.material_num
